snippet.title: Tavern Talk - Official Gameplay Trailer  | #indiegame #cozygame #visualnovel
snippet.description:
Dive into the World of Asteria. In Tavern Talk you will play the Innkeeper, mix magical drinks to help your patrons on their way, listen to their stories, gather rumors and forge new quests for them. 
It's Dungeons & Dragons meets Coffee Talk in a high fantasy setting with a lot heart, humor and twists and turns you wont see coming! With a diverse cast of characters, you will fall in love with.

Please make sure to wishlist our game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2076140/Tavern_Talk/

And follow our Kickstarter for more: https://tinyurl.com/TavernTalkKS
